text: Chopping Mall is a 1986 American science fiction horror comedy movie directed by Jim Wynorski and starring Kelli Maroney, Tony O'Dell, Russell Todd, John Terlesky, Paul Bartel and Mary Woronov. It was distributed by Concorde Pictures. Chopping Mall tells the story of security robots going rogue and killing teen shoppers after dark. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1986 science fiction movies Category:1986 horror movies Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1980s science fiction horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Wynorski Category:Movies set in shopping malls Category:Robot movies
title: Chopping Mall
